property.name: Ability
property.value: Bermuda gets +2 income if it controls this group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: The UFOs get +2 income if they control this group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card during an attack. Except for the Illuminati themselves, no group may use its transferable power during this attack; any non-Illuminati uses of transferable power already announced do not count. Players who want to add more money to the attack, or use cards, may do so.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Cthulhu gets +2 income if it controls this group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time that it is NOT your turn. Each of your groups collects income. Exceptions: the Post Office does not pay, and the IRS does not tax.

property.value: Zurich may draw one extra card per turn if it controls this group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at the beginning of your turn. You get no income (the Post Office must still pay), but you get TWO extra actions on this turn. Remember, no individual group except the UFOs may act more than once during one turn.

property.name: Ability
property.value: '+2 on any attempt to neutralize another group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to give all of your Straight groups extra income equal to their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Straight group against attack.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to give all of your Peaceful groups extra income equal to TWICE their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Peaceful group against attack.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Gets 1 MB during the income phase of each playerâ€™s turn.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to give all of your Weird groups extra income equal to TWICE their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Weird group against attack.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to give all of your Fanatic groups extra income equal to their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Fanatic group against attack.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play at the beginning of any other player's turn, before he takes any actions. That player loses one action for the turn (so, unless he plays a card of his own, he gets only one action).

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time that you acquire, or move, a group. You may place the group on a side of another card where there is no arrow. If the puppet group is moved again, the virtual arrow on the master is lost.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Discordia gets +2 income if it controls this group.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card when you have aided an attack, before the dice are rolled, to get back all the money you contributed to the attack. When you plan to use this card, make sure other players can verify how much money you contributed, to avoid arguments.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to give all of your Communist groups extra income equal to TWICE their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Communist group against attack.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to give all of your Criminal groups extra income equal to their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Communist group against attack.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time to give all of your Government groups extra income equal to their normal income. Or play this card at any time to add 10 to defend any Communist group against attack.

property.name: Ability
property.value: Play this card at any time except during an attack to put any one uncontrolled group in the discard pile. It does not count as destroyed.

property.value: Spend 10 MB from this group of your Illuminati, and get one extra action for that turn.
